scripts.postinstall: cd Frontend && rm -rf node_modules && npm install --unsafe-perm --build-from-source --no-optional --no-audit
scripts.serve: cd Frontend && nodemon -r dotenv/config --ignore ./build --exec babel-node -- server.js
scripts.dev: cd Frontend && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.post-update: echo "codesandbox preview only, need an update" && yarn upgrade --latest
